function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19","Impact":"Significant human costs, recession, and behavioral changes","Mitigation":"Vaccination, effective response, containment measures, promoting social distancing and self-isolation","Technologies":"Vaccines, testing and tracing technology, digital health monitoring","People":"Global population, small businesses, governments","Owner":"Global health organizations, governments, public health authorities, technology companies"}]}
